subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Ferreira had a goal and an assist Sunday night to help F.C. Dallas advance to Major League Soccer’s championship game with a 3-0 victory over the host Los Angeles Galaxy in the Western Conference final.
snippet: David Ferreira had a goal and an assist Sunday night to help F.C. Dallas advance to Major League Soccer’s championship game with a 3-0 victory over the host Los Angeles Galaxy in the Western Conference final.
